/Applications/Xcode.app/Contents/Developer/Toolchains/XcodeDefault.xctoolchain/usr/bin/c++   -Wl,-search_paths_first -Wl,-headerpad_max_install_names  CMakeFiles/exrheader.dir/main.cpp.o  -o exrheader  -L/opt/local/USD/lib -Wl,-rpath,/opt/local/USD/lib -Wl,-rpath,/opt/local/USD/build/OpenEXR/IlmImf ../IlmImf/libIlmImf.22.0.0.dylib -lIex -lIlmThread -lHalf -lpthread /opt/local/USD/lib/libz.dylib -lImath -lIlmThread -lpthread /opt/local/USD/lib/libz.dylib
